Talents.Name: Adaptable
Talents.Description: Can use a Mobile Riot Shield that lasts for 50s. The Mobile Riot Shield can only be deployed in the four adjacent tiles to <Operator Name>, and when deployed, <Operator Name> immediately turns to face the shield and the DEF of herself and units behind her +15%

Talents.Name: Charge and Release
Talents.Description: When the Mobile Riot Shield takes damage, there is a 50% chance to restore 1 SP to <Operator Name>
